body_html: @QuantScientist If you have Windows 10, then try this package. About the dependency issue, I reproduced it and found that you have to start the process from CMD. But in Jupyter QT Console, it still fails to import. I'll investigate this later.
body_text: @QuantScientist If you have Windows 10, then try this package. About the dependency issue, I reproduced it and found that you have to start the process from CMD. But in Jupyter QT Console, it still fails to import. I'll investigate this later.
body: @QuantScientist If you have Windows 10, then try [this](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/peterjc123/pytorch-elheu/build/job/bjj33lscnyau04sv/artifact) package. About the dependency issue, I reproduced it and found that you have to start the process from CMD. But in Jupyter QT Console, it still fails to import. I'll investigate this later.
